channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The AI-Powered Erosion Of Reality: Closing The Human Vulnerability Gap In Cybersecurity
item.description: AI is reshaping cybersecurity, not just by introducing new threats but by amplifying old ones.

item.title: Dark Chocolate And Placebos Are Also Good For Your Health
item.description: More proven health benefits from unusual sources—dark chocolate and placebos.

item.title: The COO's Roadmap To Establishing An AI-First Culture: Empowering Employees With GPTs
item.description: If you’re a COO looking to empower your employees with a GPT, here’s a straightforward roadmap for success.

item.title: Cultivating The Future: Communication, Collaboration, Education, And Creativity In Space And Technology
item.description: The magic of space exploration and technological innovation continues to propel us forward.

item.title: March 2025 Ushers In A New Era Of Hearing Health
item.description: Apple, GN, and Samsung redefined hearing tech in March 2025—merging emotional storytelling and Auracast to advance auditory accessibility at global sc...

item.title: Obvious vs perhaps
item.description: “Obvious” closes the door to inquiry. “Perhaps” opens it.

item.title: The NSE confusions
